column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a New Yorker
column2: I am not fond of Chicago pizza
column3: but I really enjoyed "the Lou." Â I had the individual
column4: and it was actually quite light - no heavy-brick-in-my-belly-feeling that has me missing my NY slices! "The Lou" has the following toppings: fresh spinach
column6: and sliced tomatoes covered with a blend of mozzarella
column7: romano and cheddar cheese. The very best part
column11: almost like pastry or Cornish pasty crust. A great place for a girls' night out- be prepared for a long wait
